items.sentence: Tom said he didn\'t know why Mary was absent.
I know that something bad is going to happen.
You drank a beer at lunch today, didn\'t you?
Tom couldn\'t help feeling that way about it.
Tom is never going to change his mind, is he?
Tom is one of the guys on my basketball team.
I got off my bicycle and sat down on a bench.
The dog chewed on one of Tom\'s tennis shoes.
Tom thinks Mary would be perfect for the job.
How many Canadians do you expect to be there?
Much to Tom\'s surprise, Mary wasn\'t afraid.
Is Tom\'s car still parked behind your house?
I wish things could\'ve happened differently.
I think I forgot to tell Tom about the party.
I don\'t think Tom could get Mary to do that.
Tom is trying very hard not to slip and fall.
Tom is upstairs practicing his saxophone now.
Do you think Tom would be willing to help me?
Do you think anyone would care if I did that?
I didn\'t know Tom was living on Park Street.
